name: Alice ~ After Story
description:
What's the future going to be like? ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Nik, the protagonist has been living his life like normal, However he keeps having flashbacks of memories that he doesn't recognize. Who is that mysterious girl? And why are there gaps in his memories? ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Alice ~ After Story is the final chapter of the Visual Novel game Alice
The game has multiple Endings, but in only one of them you get to find out the truth.
 And don't forget... Every single decision you make is going to affect the future! ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Let me know what you think in the comments below!
